CHAT.comment: FORD MOTOR COMPANY and CITIBANK (South Dakota), N.A., Petitioners v. JOHN B. McCAULEY, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVE W. BERMAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
